title: CZ氏率いるYZiラボ、BNB開発者支援で1,500億円のファンド設立　ミームコイン取引も活発
contentSnippet: バイナンス前CEOのCZ氏率いるYZiラボが、10億ドル規模のBNBチェーン開発者支援ファンドを発表した。仮想通貨BNBは急上昇しており、ミームコイン取引も活発化している。

title: メタマスク、仮想通貨の永続契約取引機能をローンチ　予測市場ポリマーケットへの対応計画も
contentSnippet: イーサリアムなどのブロックチェーンに対応する仮想通貨ウォレットのメタマスクは永続契約取引機能をローンチしたと発表。ポリマーケットへの対応計画や報酬プログラムについても説明した。

title: Bank of North Dakota Taps Fiserv to Launch State-Backed 'Roughrider Coin'
contentSnippet: North Dakota's stablecoin endeavour follows Wyoming’s Frontier Stable Token as more states test blockchain-based money.

title: Jack Dorsey's Square Unveils Bitcoin Payments, Wallet for Retailers
contentSnippet: Block's Square has debuted a new product allowing merchants to accept Bitcoin and convert sales into the cryptocurrency.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Jupiter, Ethena Labs roll out new Solana-based stablecoin
contentSnippet: Solana’s leading DEX aggregator Jupiter is launching JupUSD to serve as the backbone of its ecosystem in partnership with Ethena Labs.

title: ‘Don’t be Stupid’: Why Grant Cardone Says Bitcoiners Shouldn’t Chase Gold’s Historic Rally
contentSnippet: The real estate investor sees long-term challenges to gold’s scarcity.

title: Gemini Expands Australia Push as New Crypto Rules Loom
contentSnippet: Gemini is enabling direct Australian dollar trading as it positions a deeper commitment to the market ahead of stricter regulatory oversight.

title: Gemini expands in Australia with wait-and-see approach to pending crypto rules
contentSnippet: Crypto exchange Gemini is expanding its offering in Australia with a local entity and team, and plans to sit back and watch the country’s consultation on crypto laws.

title: MetaMask to let users bet on politics, sports via Polymarket
contentSnippet: MetaMask is partnering with Polymarket to offer all markets on the prediction platform, with the integration slated for later this year.

title: Ethereum Foundation announces 'Privacy Cluster' team
contentSnippet: The team of 47 professionals from the blockchain industry will help research and develop privacy features for the Ethereum layer-1 network.

title: Most US Growth Now Rides on AI—And Economists Suspect a Bubble
contentSnippet: A Harvard economist says 92% of U.S. growth now comes from AI spending. The Bank of England says we’re one “pop” away from pain.

title: Rep. Steil: Market structure bill still on track, despite shutdown
contentSnippet: Senate Republicans initially said they planned to pass digital asset market structure before 2026, but consideration of the bill was already delayed before the shutdown.

title: Pantera Backs TransCrypts with $15M Seed Round to Expand Blockchain Identity Platform
contentSnippet: The funds will be used to expand the company’s credential verification system beyond employment into healthcare and education.

title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $123K as Miners Rally; VanEck Sees $644K BTC Amid Gold Gains
contentSnippet: The gold rally may need to cool before bitcoin could really gain momentum, suggested another analyst.

title: US Senate confirms Treasury official as government shutdown continues
contentSnippet: As the Treasury’s Under Secretary for Domestic Finance, Jonathan McKernan can influence policies on banking and a US digital dollar.

title: U.S. Senators Get 250K Letters Calling for Protection of Stablecoin Yields
contentSnippet: Stand With Crypto encouraged the messaging from its massive online list of advocates, asking the lawmakers to leave the GENIUS Act alone.

title: Shayne Coplan Becomes Youngest Self-Made Billionaire After Polymarket's $2B Investment: BBG
contentSnippet: Shayne Coplan’s net worth reportedly passed $1 billion after the New York Stock Exchange's owner valued Polymarket at $8 billion.

title: North Dakota, Fiserv announce plan for state-backed ‘Roughrider’ stablecoin
contentSnippet: North Dakota has announced plans to launch Roughrider Coin, a fully dollar-backed stablecoin, in 2026, in partnership with payments company Fiserv.

title: Polymarket CEO Shayne Coplan Is Youngest ‘Self-Made Billionaire,’ Bloomberg Says
contentSnippet: Polymarket’s CEO Shayne Coplan has entered the billionaire club—alongside Changpeng “CZ” Zhao, Michael Saylor, and Satoshi Nakamoto.

title: Bitcoin rebounds toward range highs as data highlights ‘real liquidity’
contentSnippet: Bitcoin bulls chase $125,000 as buying pressure intensifies, pointing to an influx of liquidity and growing confidence among spot and institutional traders.

title: Polymarket founder Coplan joins billionaires club after NYSE parent's investment: Report
contentSnippet: The prediction market platform has come a long way after regulators in the United States banned Polymarket from serving US clients in 2022.

title: Square Launches Bitcoin Payment Tools for Small Businesses
contentSnippet: The features allow U.S. sellers to accept BTC, convert fiat sales automatically and manage crypto alongside traditional finances.

title: This NYSE-Listed Food Company Aims to Stack $1.2 Billion in Bitcoin
contentSnippet: DDC's share price was up nearly 7% after announcing that it had raised an additional $124 million for Bitcoin purchases.

title: Solana DeFi Exchange Jupiter to Launch Native Stablecoin
contentSnippet: Solana DEX and DeFi protocol Jupiter is expanding its feature set with the launch of its own stablecoin, JupUSD, on Solana.

title: Hyperliquid Lists MON-USD Perpetuals Ahead of Hotly Anticipated Monad Airdrop
contentSnippet: Both Hyperliquid’s announcement and Monad’s recent posts suggest that an airdrop may be imminent.

title: Stablecoins: The Revolution in Global Money Transfers
contentSnippet: Stablecoins are no longer just a bridge between crypto and fiat — they are becoming the rails of global commerce, writes Nonco CEO Fernando Martinez.

title: North Dakota to Issue Stablecoin With Fiserv as Digital Dollar Trend Expands
contentSnippet: The Fiserv-powered U.S. dollar stablecoin will be available to local banks and credit unions, joining crypto experiments by U.S. states.

title: The State of DeFi Exploit Risk
contentSnippet: DeFi protocols can rival or surpass traditional financial security standards and introduce frameworks to better assess risks in real-world asset applications for smarter capital allocation, says Cicad

title: Tezos Shooter ‘Reaper Actual’ From EverQuest Co-Creator Enters Alpha Playtesting
contentSnippet: John Smedley, the man behind EverQuest, H1Z1, and PlanetSide, has debuted his crypto shooter into an alpha playtesting phase.

title: MetaMask Adds Support for Hyperliquid Swaps, Eyes Polymarket Integration
contentSnippet: MetaMask also unveiled a rewards system.

title: The Protocol: 77% of Bitcoin Holders Have Never Used BTCFi, Survey Reveals
contentSnippet: Also: Ethereum Fusaka Upgrade on Holesky, DoubleZero Goes Live and Bee Maps Raises $42M.

title: ビットフライヤー、「スカイ（SKY）」の取扱い開始　メイカーダオ後継トークン
contentSnippet: bitFlyerは、メイカーダオ（MakerDAO）の後継トークン「スカイ（SKY）」の取扱いを開始。取扱記念キャンペーンも実施し、販売所での購入が可能となった。

title: IG証券、ビットコインETF・イーサリアムETFのCFD取引を提供開始
contentSnippet: IG証券がビットコインETF・イーサリアムETFのCFD取引を開始。制度化が進む日本市場で、税区分や課税扱いを巡る動向にも注目が集まる。

title: 「ビットコインは金に比べ著しく過小評価」ライトスパークCEO語る
contentSnippet: ライトスパークCEOのデービッド・マーカス氏が、ビットコインは金と比較して著しく過小評価されており、金と同等の価値なら1BTC=130万ドルに達すると主張した。金価格が史上最高値の4000ドルを突破する中、JPモルガンもビットコインが過小評価されていると指摘し、16.5万ドルの価格予測を発表している。

title: トランプミームコイン発行企業、2億ドル調達でトレジャリー企業設立へ＝報道
contentSnippet: TRUMPミームコイン発行企業が最低2億ドルの資金調達を計画中とブルームバーグが報道。低迷するトークン蓄積のためデジタル資産トレジャリー企業設立を目指す。

title: 米金融大手BNYメロン、トークン化預金を検討＝報道
contentSnippet: BNYメロンがトークン化預金の導入検討をブルームバーグが報道。1日2.5兆ドルの決済を処理する同行がブロックチェーン活用でインフラ近代化を推進。

title: 「仮想通貨への投資は今でも遅すぎない」パンテラ幹部が見解
contentSnippet: パンテラキャピタルのゼネラルパートナーがビットコイン、イーサリアム、ソラナなど仮想通貨投資の将来性を語った。ファンドマネージャーの多くが投資しておらず拡大余地ありとする。

title: クリーンコア、ドージコイン保有量7.1億DOGE到達　含み益30億円超に
contentSnippet: 米NYSE上場のクリーンコアソリューションズが公式ドージコイン・トレジャリーの保有量7.1億DOGE突破を発表。10億枚目標に向けビットスタンプ提携で取得継続中。

title: 米SEC、仮想通貨企業向け「イノベーション免除」制度を年内にも正式化へ
contentSnippet: SECのアトキンス委員長が8日、仮想通貨企業向けの「イノベーション免除」制度を年内か2026年第1四半期に正式化する意向を示した。政府閉鎖が規則制定の進展を妨げている。
